item.title: a short teaser video campaign (1 to 2 minutes) to invite people to my 45-minute free webinar - Upwork
item.description:
I need a short teaser video campaign (1 to 2 minutes) to invite people suffering from Multiple Sclerosis disease (MS) to my 45-minute free webinar where I reveal the secrets of how to reverse their MS and regain their health. The teaser video should have the following qualities: magnetic, motivating, and visually appealing so that they want to learn more about my solution. if you can develop an effective teaser video, we can discuss the 45-minute webinar video production as well.

item.title: Video Editor for Premiere Pro Multi-Camera Productions - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking to partner with a video editor who is proficient in Premiere Pro, including fundamental MultiCam editing. We produce a small but growing number of projects weekly, usually under 3 minutes in length each and in templated formats. We will soon be branching into YouTube Shorts for channel promotion as well.

**MUST use Adobe Premiere Pro with an active subscription for collaboration purposes**

Ideally, you'll be able to:

1) Formulate multi-camera sequences in Premiere Pro projects

2) Color-correct the footage using a single adjustment layer for each angle

3) Edit the footage to match the creative brief

You will not be expected to...

– Fix/improve audio quality
– Implement graphics
– Add intros/outros

...as these will be done in the final round by the senior editor, at least initially.

If you have experience with...
- Christian churches
- YouTube Shorts
- Local service businesses
- Tutorial editing
- Podcast-style video
...then we may be a great fit to work together!

Some projects require quick turnaround, sometimes in fewer than three days. For these sorts of projects we'll attempt to develop reusable project templates and frameworks to assist your process.

We have a video that needs to be produced by end-of-day on July 4th, 2024. Here is the video we produced most recently using a template we're able to provide to you from our Adobe Premiere Pro Production: https://f.io/WEF4aE7b

PAYMENT
We will be offering test contracts for up to $500USD and would like to have multiple editors available. Each video assignment will be billed as an individual milestone and we're open to renegotiating our arrangements at the end of the test contract.



Budget: $500
Posted On: July 01, 2024 18:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Explainer Video, Elearning Video, YouTube Shorts, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Podcast Editing
Skills: Color Grading, Explainer Video, Elearning Video, YouTube Shorts, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Podcast Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
Hi,

We are a YouTube Automation company and we are looking for a talented, hard-working, and experienced video editor to join our team.

We are looking for MULTIPLE people experienced in video editing for the vintage American lifestyle Niche, similar channel to this channel:

Vintage lifestyle USA - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3DOlyOXBZmQ

We are looking for a long-term collaboration, on a project basis in the beginning, and eventually, if we are a good fit we would also have the full- time/retainer opportunity.

item.title: YouTube Long Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a FullTime YouTube editor.

My YouTube channel is “TheOfficialMatei” - in the “SMMA” / “Facebook Ads” niche.

Please checkout my channel BEFORE applying.

We are looking for a TALENTED individual who has that special touch of turning regular videos into highly engaging videos.

Required Skills:
Longform Video Editing
Motion Graphics (Adobe Aftereffects)
Content Directing (Being able to tell us what we should do to make the videos better)

Inspirational Styles:
Iman Gadzhi
Daniel Dalen

Job Role:
Fulltime Position
Edit 2 long form videos per week
Possibly edit some short form content, pending how big the long form videos are

Lots of opportunity to grow, manage teams, direct content, etc

**************** ↓ HOW TO APPLY ↓ ****************
1. Reply with who we have as creative inspiration above
2. Send me your portfolio of LONGFORM videos.
3. Make sure your best work is labelled so i can easily find it.  DO NOT SEND A GIANT LIST OF VIDEOS FOR ME TO GO THROUGH.  Please let me know what are your favourite

Hourly Range: $4.00-$8.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 18:10 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production

item.description:
Briefing: Compile five (5) reels, elegant, classy showcasing the themes noted below. Please show similar work, or style.

Deadline: Thursday 4th July
Total Deliverables: Five (5) IG Reels
Duration: 15-Second Reels (Portrait dimension)
Footage: Video & Music will be provided to winning portfolio

Examples:
- Sample 1: https://www.instagram.com/kymabeachdubai/ : The colors, motion, elegance, but showing a very happy place
- Sample 2: https://www.instagram.com/p/C8OwP0iMv1s/ : Good use of speed ramp (Slow-to-fast-to-slow), good transitions, very classy
- Sample 3: https://www.instagram.com/p/C6Ez1DsOHQo/ : Fun, upbeat, happy!


Theme - Beach Area : Two (2)
Must show: beach area, drinks in coconuts/pineapples, beach snacks

Theme -  Grass Area :  Two (2)
Must show: after work drinks

Theme -   Pool Area : One (1)
Must show: sunset pool area

Budget: $100

Skills: Video Commercial, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production

item.title: Female Video Editor for Beauty Businesses - Upwork
item.description:
Women Entrepreneur! Join Our Creative Team as a Video Editor at GEM Social!

GEM Social, a dynamic social media marketing agency specializing in beauty businesses, is seeking a passionate and skilled Video Editor. Our mission is to showcase beauty brands at their best, and we need your talent to make it happen!

What You'll Do:
Craft Engaging Content: Edit and perfect short-form videos for platforms like Instagram Reels, TikTok, and Facebook, ensuring they align with our unique brand voice and style. Simple edits required.

Stay Organized: Keep our project management tools up-to-date, coordinating with the team to track progress and meet deadlines efficiently.

Who You Are:

Motivated and Excited: Eager to grow, you bring enthusiasm to every project.

Skilled Editor: Proficient in CapCut, with Premiere Pro skills being a super plus. You know how to bring stories to life.

Social Media Savvy: Familiar with the nuances of social media videos, you understand what captures an audience's attention.

A Team Player: Collaborating and communicating effectively, you're ready to be an integral part of our all-female creative team.

Beauty Enthusiast: You have an interest in beauty and some experience in the beauty field.

Fluent in English: Strong communication skills in English are essential.

What We Offer:

Contractor Position with Potential for Full-Time: Start with a flexible contractor role, with the potential to transition to a full-time position.

Flexible Hours: We value work-life balance and your personal time.

A Growing Company: Join us in our exciting phase of growth and be part of our success story.

Joining Us Means:

Making a significant impact in how beauty businesses present themselves online.

Being part of a vibrant, creative team that values your input and creativity.

Constant learning and growth opportunities in the ever-evolving field of social media marketing.

Ready to Apply?

Great! To be considered for this exciting opportunity at GEM Social, apply here on Upwork. Note, responses that don't answer the question nor are well written out, showing an AI usage of English, will be ignored.



Hourly Range: $8.00-$12.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 17:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Video Production, English
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Audio Editing, Video Production, English
Country: United States
click to apply

item.description:
Hi, I am looking for someone to edit an existing 9 second video file by changing the background from light to dark. Please see the attached PDF as a visual reference. You'll notice that the front and the back of the video has a lighter background, but the middle section has a dark background. The whole video needs to have the dark background.

I have attached the video as well. I believe I have all the pieces available that built this video.

Please let me know if you have any questions! I would need a video file back fairly quickly though, so I don't think it would be too difficult (??).

Mark

item.title: UGC - Unboxing and Product Review - 30-40 Seconds - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a female actress/content creator, ideally aged between 25-35, for an exciting project producing User Generated Content (UGC) videos.

Ideal Candidate:
- Aged 25-40, female.
- Must be a charismatic and confident person.
- Ability to produce high-quality, bespoke videos.
- Experience in acting is preferred, but not necessary. Influencers who know how to work with a camera and can provide high-quality videos are also encouraged to apply.

Scope of Work: The successful candidate will be required to create 1 short video, about a 30-40 seconds long. The brand is startup better-for-you brand.

Application Process:
- Please submit a video portfolio of your previous work, showcasing your ability to create high-quality videos and, if possible, any acting or influencing experience.
- Even if you're not a professional actor, as long as you know how to work with the camera and can deliver quality videos, you're welcome to apply.

Support
The selected candidate will receive an influencer deck to help with content creation, we would also encourage the creator to meet with the team to learn an understand the story behind the brand.

Usage
The content produced is to be used on social media and to advertise the brand. We may use parts of the content in other content, but we must be careful not to distort the integrity of the content.

We look forward to reviewing your submissions and discussing the opportunity to collaborate on this exciting project!

Budget: $100
Posted On: July 01, 2024 17:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Intro & Outro
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Coach for MedSpa BizAcademy - Upwork
item.description:
MedSpa BizAcademy is dedicated to empowering healthcare providers to grow their medical spas, bring marketing in-house, and run lean, efficient operations. We offer comprehensive coaching and resources to help our clients achieve their business goals. We are looking for an experienced and creative YouTube Coach to join our team and help us create engaging, informative content for our YouTube channel.

Job Description:
As a YouTube Coach, you will work closely with our founder to develop and execute a content strategy that aligns with our mission and goals. You will be responsible for coaching on video production, editing, optimization, and audience engagement. Your expertise will help us create high-quality videos that resonate with our audience and drive growth for our channel.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with the founder to develop a content calendar and strategy.
Provide coaching on video production, including scripting, filming, and editing.
Optimize videos for SEO and audience engagement.
Analyze YouTube analytics to track performance and make data-driven recommendations.
Stay up-to-date with YouTube trends and best practices.
Assist in building and nurturing our YouTube community through comments and engagement.
Qualifications:

Proven experience as a YouTube Coach or similar role.
Strong understanding of YouTube algorithms, SEO, and analytics.
Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Final Cut Pro).
Excellent communication and coaching skills.
Creative mindset with a passion for video content.
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.


Posted On: July 01, 2024 17:47 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:YouTube Development, YouTube Marketing, YouTube, Social Media Management
Skills: YouTube Development, YouTube Marketing, YouTube, Social Media Management
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube video editing and description optimization - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for an experienced video editor to edit existing videos in a series to make them engaging and interesting for YouTube. This includes adding copy and imagery to support the message of videos and just making the videos overall more interesting, engaging, and increase watch time of each video.

The ability to also create SEO optimized YouTube video descriptions based on descriptions that are already written is a plus.

There are several videos that I would like a consistent look and feel that matches my brand, and the price can be discussed based on experience, turnaround time, and expected outcomes of the videos (watch time, engagment).

Example of video to be edited:

item.title: AI Image/Video Assistant - Upwork
item.description:
Hello! We are producing a series of AI-generated short films for YouTube that are designed to teach languages.  I'm looking for some help with the production of AI images and video..

I will be writing scripts for these short films/movies and noting where AI images and videos are needed, trying to describe with as much detail what is needed.  Then, you will take those prompts and create AI videos (or AI images to run through an AI video generator) and review them with me.  This is a relatively fun and easy job.

Duties:
- Work with me to understand what images/videos are needed for each script.  I will try to create a detailed shot list.
- generating AI images
- generating AI video

Skills:
- AI Image/Video generation with Midjourney, Pika, Runway, Stable Video Diffusion, Luma Labs, Sora, etc.  Let me know if you have any experience in any of these.



Hourly Range: $7.00-$15.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 17:24 UTC
Category: AI Video Generation & Editing
Skills:AI Image Generation, AI Video Generation, AI Video Generator
Skills: AI Image Generation, AI Video Generation, AI Video Generator
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editor for YouTube channel - Upwork
item.description:
Exciting Opportunity: Experienced Video Editor for High-Impact YouTube Content

Are you a video editing wizard passionate about crafting stories that captivate and engage? We are on the lookout for a skilled professional to take charge of our video creation process, delivering premium YouTube content. This position involves producing videos with approximately 10 videos each month, with each video around 10 minutes in length.

Who Should Apply?
Ideal candidates or teams should have:
- Previous experience with YouTube automation channels and a track record of measurable success.
- Deep understanding of YouTube’s operational guidelines, copyright laws, and fair use policies.
- Proficiency in video editing, with access to stock footage sites.
- A portfolio showcasing the ability to create monetizable videos.
- Affinity with making videos about business stories.

What Makes You Perfect for This Role?
- Your knack for producing binge-worthy YouTube content.
- An innate ability to maintain viewer engagement through excellent pacing and smooth transitions.
- Proven capability to meet tight deadlines.
- Commitment to quality with minimal revisions.
- Exceptional organizational and communication skills.
- Rapid turnaround capabilities.
- Ability to deliver projects via Google Drive.
- A good sense of humor always helps!

Video Production Expectations:
- Craft engaging openings with a 10-second hook and interactive prompts like subscribe notifications. No need for a channel introduction after the opening of the video.
- Maintain a humorous and engaging narrative throughout the video body, culminating with channel end screens.
- Incorporate copyright-free sound effects and background music judiciously.
- Utilize professional-grade editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Davinci Resolve, or Final Cut Pro to ensure videos are 1080p HD+ quality, focusing on click-through and retention rates.

Job Specifications:
- Produce 2 videos per week, each over 8 minutes.
- Compensation: $25 per video, with potential for higher rates based on proven exceptional performance.

Ready to Join Us?
Please apply by sending your current portfolio/sample work for review. We prioritize candidates who best align with our needs as outlined above. Your ability to produce high-quality, result-driven content can open the door to enhanced compensation and a thriving professional journey with us.



Posted On: July 01, 2024 17:17 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Short form video editor of street interviews - Upwork
item.description:
We are promoting a new brand by doing street interviews with random people and filming it to post on Instagram, Tiktok and Youtube.

We need help to edit the raw footage from each interview into one or more short form videos, minimum 1 video per day.

We are expecting you to take out the best parts, focusing on editing it to be funny and engaging.

Please provide samples of your previous work.

If your English is not your first language or on an EXTRAORDINARY level, please don't apply. Your English skills will be tested.

Kind regards,
Oscar

Hourly Range: $3.00-$6.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 17:13 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: Sweden
